Terms of sales IMPORT DUTIES, TAXES AND CHARGESInternational Buyers, please note that import duties, taxes and charges are NOT included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are always the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to buying. An international buyer may wish to know that custom charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when they buyer pick the item up at the designated delivery address. Do not confuse import duties, taxes and charges as additional shipping charges. RETURNIf you would like to return the item, you must contact us with reason(s) stated within 3 Days after receiving the item. Late notification will not be considered under ALL circumstances. Our customer service officer will contact you for refund details. When both parties have reached an agreement and provided that the item is in the same condition as we ship out, they buyer's refund will be given as Money Back.We will bear the shipping cost from Japan to the buyer's country but the return shipping from the buyer's country to Japan will be paid by buyer under ALL circumstances. FEEDBACKWe always value your comment. However, if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, please contact us before leaving neutral or negative feedback. We are committed to your satisfaction. Please remember to leave us a POSITIVE Rating with 5 star so that we know the transaction was successful. About us Hellovintage was first found in Tokyo, Japan in 2014. Since then, Hellovintage has been searching for rare and precious brand name vintage bags and accessories from various cities of Japan. With support from our wholesale partners and retail customers, we are grateful that our business has grown from domestic to international these years. Our clients are from US, Australia, France and Mainland China.As one of the world-class top vintage sellers, we care about your benefit and our reputation. As a measure of quality assurance, we only import items from markets registered under the Japan Metropolitan Police Department. In addition, we have our own in-house appraiser who is experienced and professional in appreising all vintage items in different brands. As a result, in Hellovintage, authenticity is always guaranteed.In 2015, Hellovintage expanded our business to online market and created our offical wedsite. With this online platform, Hellovintage wishes to bring worldwide vintage lovers with high quality vintage with reasonable price. In addition, Hellovintage has established an office in Hong Kong to cope with the growing business development. In the past, Hellovintage has held a number of events such as cross-over show, roadshow campaign, auction, pop-up store in both mainland and Hong Kong.Last but not least, Hellovintage is dedicated to tell the world about the charm and priceless value of vintage. It is Hellovintages ultimate goal to help upholding the forever fashion vintage trend in this modern time. AuthenticityWe are a registered and licensed seller in Japan. In Japan, every seller who deals with pre-owned luxury or branded items must fulfill the strict requirements set by Japan Metropolitan Police Department and obtains a Second Hand Goods Dealers License (KOBUTSU SHO古物商) from them. This license protects the buyers right and ensures the licensee to comply with all rules and regulations including tax requirements of the Japanese government.Hellovintage is proud that we have obtained the Second Hand Goods Dealers License, in fact is one of the few officially registered legal business companies in Japan. Besides, all items we imported have been inspected by our Japan Branch professional appraisers who have completed courses on brand identification. Thus, our authenticity is 100% guaranteed! Where are our products from?ALL ITEMS are from Japanese people who wants to sell their items to us. After checking and assessment, our Japan Branch professional appraisers will wrap them carefully and deliver them to the Hong Kong Head Office for storage and international trading. Contact us Enquiry is always welcome via the eBay message channel.Our standard business hours is from 10am to 7pm, Monday to Friday (HK and Japan) and 10am to 1pm on Saturdays (HK). We are dedicated to fast response service and you can expect your reply by the end of the next business day after enquiry. (UTC+08:00)Privacy PolicyPlease kindly be advised that Hellovintage would respect your privacy and data as our highest priority. All personal information you released Hellovintage will not be released to third parties and we would always handle your personal information in accordance with the privacy policy.
